showerReviews.reviewText: … . They have several spots for rv.Several spots for tents, they have a learning center for kids. They have 2 restrooms, one has an outdoor shower. They also have a place to clean fish.Where you have water and a place to throw your scraps. …
The RV spots are first-come, first-serve. We paid $22 per night for 2 nights. No hookups although they have a water hose near the restrooms/shower with potable water. …

Very nice camping. Power at some tent sights.  Indoor bathrooms, Shower outside around back. Nice trails. Paddle boarding ect.. must spray watercraft. Check ahead if need to spray prior.  Not a national park or co. A city park. Pay for the …
Love camping here. The rangers are awesome and the view was beautiful. Only drawback is the outdoor only shower.
Good campground close to Denver and Boulder. Camped right by the lake and they even have an outdoor shower you can use.
The camp site is recommended. Over average cleaniness of bathroom, outside warm shower, low price. Caring rangers.
Spectacular views!Cool staff....shower situation could be better but would recommend!!!
